name: College Basketball Dynasty Sim
description:
College Basketball: Dynasty Sim puts you at the helm of a college basketball team. Do you have what it takes to build your team from the ground up, from a cupcake to a perennial powerhouse? Choose a College Basketball team, customize and upgrade your coach, customize your non-conference games, adjust your gameplan, scout and recruit new players, and bid on transfers to see if you have what it takes to win Conference Championships and the Big Tournament.

Includes over 120 teams to choose from
